Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/75th
ShortDescription: Northbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood and South Chicago: due to, street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood, South Chicago and over regular route, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with major delays, due to mechanical problem on a train at Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with major delays, due to mechanical problem on a train at Pulaski. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

#7 Harrison

#53 Pulaski

As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are requested from Forest Park to UIC-Halsted to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
